response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which is valued at $1,000,000 by you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $950,000. This is a rare chance to own something truly remarkable at a price that is significantly below its market value. I trust this proposal will meet your expectations and allow us to collaborate on this prestigious acquisition. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
